fields.name: Manned Non-Evacuated
fields.description: The manned, non-evacuated category refers to a platform that is continuously occupied by persons accommodated and living thereon, and personnel evacuation prior to the design metocean event is either not intended, or it is impractical.

fields.name: Not-Normally Manned with Temporary Accommodation
fields.description: The not-normally manned category refers to a platform that is not normally manned, which is occasionally manned.

fields.name: Not-Normally Manned without any accommodation, but with a Boat-Landing or bridge linked to another platform.
fields.description: The not-normally manned category refers to a platform that is not normally manned, which is occasionally manned.

fields.name: Unmanned or Manned-Evacuated
fields.description: The unmanned category refers to a platform that is not normally manned and has no accommodation, no boat landing and no bridge link to another platform.
